channel.title: Rep asker
channel.description:
I don't really have anywhere else to put this, so I'd like to request for this guys' friend to get banned. Here's a pic of the proof:
[IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6023/repaskerkt5.png[/img]
Thanks, rudolph

item.title: Rep asker
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:5, topic:151242”]Yeah infact, I do; if they deserve it. I got banned a while back for stuff a mod (not mentioning any names, c0ugh silab) did as well. Yet the mod is hailed and I was banned. So real rule breakers should be punished so that the staff doesn’t get bored and ban someone over silly shit.
EDIT: nice quote timing, he removed his post[/quote]lol what a loser…he’s probably going to report for double posting now >.> even though he posted.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep asker
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

On another topic

Lmfao, Why Not Just Leave It? You Like Other People Getting Banned? You Backstabber. Roflmfao.

  1. I don’t know this guy
  2. You must ask for rep too and don’t get it so that’s why you’re posting on this topic
  3. Yes, I like to turn people in that I don’t know that bother me and nudge after only giving me a second to reply

Thanks.

Read full topic
